visit_dump.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ======================
00002 !
00003 !   VISIT_DUMP
00004 !
00005 !   Write out particle data for 
00006 !   VISIT postprocessing
00007 !   Each PE writes to its own file - to be concatenated later
00008 !
00009 !
00010 ! ======================
00011 
00012 subroutine visit_dump(timestamp)
00013 
00014 
00015   use treevars
00016   implicit none   
00017 
00018   integer, parameter :: npart_visit_max = 250000  ! Max 25k data points for VIS
00019   real, dimension(npart_visit_max) :: xvis,yvis,zvis,vx,vy,vz,axvis,ayvis,azvis,qvis,mvis
00020   integer, dimension(npart_visit_max) :: ppid, plabel
00021 
00022   integer,  dimension(npart_visit_max) :: icolour
00023   real, dimension(ngx) :: work1, work2
00024 
00025   real :: dx, dz, dy, xd, yd, zd, dummy, simtime, epondx, epondy, epondz, phipond, epond_max, box_max
00026   real :: Qtot, Qbox
00027 
00028   character(30) :: cfile
00029   character(5) :: cme
00030   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00031   integer, intent(in) :: timestamp
00032   integer :: i, j, k, ioffset, idummy=0, ilev, ixd, iyd, izd, npx, npz, npy
00033   integer :: icall, lcount
00034   integer :: jfoc, kfoc
00035 
00036   icall = timestamp/ivis
00037   simtime = timestamp*dt
00038 
00039   ! Filename (directory) prefix
00040   cme = "pe" // achar(me/100+48) // achar(mod(me/10,10)+48) // achar(mod(me,10)+48)  
00041 
00042   ! get filename suffix from dump counter
00043   do i=0,4
00044      cdump(6-i:6-i) =  achar(mod(timestamp/10**i,10) + 48)  
00045   end do
00046   cdump(1:1) = achar(timestamp/10**5 + 48)
00047 
00048   ! get filename suffix from call counter
00049   do i=0,4
00050      cvis(6-i:6-i) =  achar(mod(icall/10**i,10) + 48)  
00051   end do
00052   cvis(1:1) = achar(icall/10**5 + 48)
00053 
00054   cfile=cme//"/wf_info."//cdump
00055   open (60,file=cfile)    
00056   write(60,'(a9,i8/4(a9,f12.5/),4(a9,i8/),a9,f8.3)')  &
00057        'npp=',npp, 'xl=',xl, 'yl=',yl, 'zl=',zl, 'boxsize=',zl, &
00058        'ne=',ne, 'ni=',ni, 'np=',np_beam, 'itime=',timestamp, 't =',simtime
00059   close(60)
00060 
00061   cfile = cme//"/wf_ele."//cdump
00062   open (60,file=cfile) 
00063   cfile = cme//"/wf_ion."//cdump
00064   open (61,file=cfile) 
00065 
00066   do i=1,npp
00067      if (pelabel(i) <= ne) then
00068         write(60,'(10(1pe12.3),i6,i9)') &
00069              x(i), y(i), z(i), ux(i), uy(i), uz(i), q(i) &
00070              ,ax(i)*m(i)/q(i), ay(i)*m(i)/q(i), az(i)*m(i)/q(i) &  ! electric field = m.a/q
00071              ,pepid(i), pelabel(i)
00072 
00073      else if (pelabel(i) <=ne+ni) then
00074         write(61,'(10(1pe12.3),i6,i9)') &
00075              x(i), y(i), z(i), ux(i), uy(i), uz(i), q(i) &
00076              ,ax(i)*m(i)/q(i), ay(i)*m(i)/q(i), az(i)*m(i)/q(i) &
00077              ,pepid(i), pelabel(i)
00078      else
00079      endif
00080 
00081   end do
00082   close(60)
00083   close(61)
00084 
00085 
00086   if (me==0) then
00087      !  Fields: electron and ion densities within xl*yl*zl
00088      cfile = "wf_field."//cdump
00089      open (62,file=cfile)
00090 
00091      dx = xl/ngx
00092      dy = yl/ngy
00093      dz = zl/ngz
00094      Qbox = 0.
00095      do k=1,ngz
00096         do j=1,ngy
00097            do i=1,ngx
00098               Qbox = Qbox + rhoe(i,j,k)*dx*dy*dz
00099               write(62,'(3f13.5,2e13.3)') i*dx,j*dy,k*dz,abs(rhoe(i,j,k)),rhoi(i,j,k)
00100            end do
00101         end do
00102      end do
00103      Qtot = SUM(rhoe)*dx*dy*dz  ! including ghost cells
00104      if (debug>0) write(ipefile,'(4(a,f14.5/))') &
00105           'Total charge on grid:',Qbox, &
00106           '         ghost cells:',Qtot-Qbox, &
00107           '                 sum:',Qtot, &
00108           'Initial charge Q_s*Ne = rho0*V = ',Vplas*rho0
00109 
00110      close(62)
00111 
00112 
00113      cfile = "wf_field_slice."//cdump
00114      open (62,file=cfile)
00115 
00116      jfoc = focus(2)/dy
00117      kfoc = focus(3)/dz
00118 
00119 ! density average line-out along laser axis: 5x5 average, converted to n/nc
00120 
00121      work1 = 0.
00122      work2 = 0.
00123      do k=kfoc-2,kfoc+2
00124         do j=jfoc-2,jfoc+2
00125            work1(1:ngx) = work1(1:ngx)+rhoi(1:ngx,j,k)/25./omega**2  ! density slice along laser axis: 5x5 average
00126            work2(1:ngx) = work2(1:ngx)+rhoe(1:ngx,j,k)/25./omega**2
00127         end do
00128      end do
00129 
00130      write(62,'(3f13.5)') (i*dx,work1(i),work2(i),i=1,ngx)
00131      close(62)
00132 
00133      ! ship pond force as 'domain boxes' on grid - could carve this up as well
00134      if (beam_config ==4) then
00135         box_max = xl/25.
00136         epond_max = sqrt(1.+vosc**2/2.)/2.
00137         lcount=0
00138         dx = 2.*xl/ngx
00139         dz = zl/ngz
00140         dy = yl/ngy
00141         do i=1,ngx
00142            do j=1,ngy
00143               do k=1,ngz
00144                  lcount=lcount+1
00145                  xvis(lcount) = -1.5*xl+(i-0.5)*dx
00146                  yvis(lcount) = (j-0.5)*dy
00147                  zvis(lcount) = (k-0.5)*dz
00148                  xd = xvis(lcount) - focus(1) ! position relative to laser focus
00149                  yd = yvis(lcount) - focus(2)
00150                  zd = zvis(lcount) - focus(3)
00151                  call fpond(simtime,tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega,-xd,yd,zd,epondx,epondy,epondz,phipond)  ! evaluate pond force
00152                  mvis(lcount) = max(0.02, abs(epondx)/epond_max*box_max)  ! scale box size for plot
00153                  icolour(lcount) = 100*epondx/epond_max*box_max
00154                  qvis(lcount) = phipond*10
00155               end do
00156            end do
00157         end do
00158 
00159 
00160      else
00161 
00162         ! ship branch nodes to show domains
00163         do j=1,nbranch_sum
00164            ilev = log( 1.*branch_key(j) )/log(8.)
00165            ixd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00166            iyd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00167            izd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i+2,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00168            mvis(j) = boxsize/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00169            xvis(j)=ixd*mvis(j) + xmin
00170            yvis(j)=iyd*mvis(j) + ymin
00171            zvis(j)=izd*mvis(j) + zmin
00172            icolour(j) = branch_owner(j)
00173            lcount = nbranch_sum
00174         end do
00175         !       call flvisit_spk_domains_send( simtime, xvis,yvis,zvis,size,branch_owner,xvis,nbranch_sum)
00176 
00177      endif
00178 
00179 
00180      cfile="wf_domain."//cdump
00181      open (60,file=cfile) 
00182      write(60,'((4(f12.3),i6,2f12.3))') &
00183           (xvis(i),yvis(i),zvis(i),mvis(i),icolour(i),mvis(i),qvis(i),i=1,lcount)
00184      close(60)
00185   endif
00186 
00187   call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)  ! Wait for everyone to catch up
00188   icall = icall + 1
00189 
00190 end subroutine visit_dump
